clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of PLM60 in Advanced HCC
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Open-label, Single-center Phase Ib Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Liposome-entrapped Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Injection (PLM60) in Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a dose escalation study based on 3+3 design with the aim to establish MTD and provide RP2D. PLM60 is to administered by multi-cycle intravenous infusion.

primary_outcome.description: To identify the maximum tolerated dose (MTD).
To identify the Recommended Phase II Dose (RP2D)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: To preliminarily evaluate the AUC in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate Cmax in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate Tmax in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate ORR in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate PFS in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate ORR in patients with advanced HCC.
To preliminarily evaluate DoR in patients with advanced HCC.

arm_group.description: Three dose levels will be tested according to the "3 + 3" dose-escalation design.The dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) will be assessed from the first administration of PLM60 to the end of the first cycle (28 days).
